mapper.sql: a.report_registration_id AS "reportRegistrationId", a.complaint_main_id AS "complaintMainId", a.report_emp AS "reportEmp", a.patient_mobile AS "patientMobile", a.patient_relation AS "patientRelation", a.report_time AS "reportTime", a.registration_emp AS "registrationEmp", a.registration_time AS "registrationTime", a.dispute_time AS "disputeTime", a.is_major AS "isMajor", a.summary_of_disputes AS "summaryOfDisputes", a.focus AS "focus", a.patient_ask AS "patientAsk", a.next_link AS "nextLink", a.next_link_man AS "nextLinkMan", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", b.case_number AS "complaintMainId.caseNumber", b.patient_name AS "complaintMainId.patientName", b.patient_sex AS "complaintMainId.patientSex", b.patient_age AS "complaintMainId.patientAge", b.patient_card AS "complaintMainId.patientCard", b.involve_hospital AS "complaintMainId.involveHospital", b.hospital_level AS "complaintMainId.hospitalLevel", b.hospital_grade AS "complaintMainId.hospitalGrade", b.involve_department AS "complaintMainId.involveDepartment", b.involve_employee AS "complaintMainId.involveEmployee", b.proc_ins_id AS "complaintMainId.procInsId", d.AREANAME AS "areaName"
LEFT JOIN COMPLAINT_MAIN b ON b.complaint_main_id = a.complaint_main_id LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE o on o.id=b.involve_hospital LEFT JOIN AREA d ON d.AREAID=o.area_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT_REGISTRATION( report_registration_id, complaint_main_id, report_emp, patient_mobile, patient_relation, report_time, registration_emp, registration_time, dispute_time, is_major, summary_of_disputes, focus, patient_ask, next_link, next_link_man, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{reportRegistrationId}, #{complaintMainId}, #{reportEmp}, #{patientMobile}, #{patientRelation}, #{reportTime}, #{registrationEmp}, #{registrationTime}, #{disputeTime}, #{isMajor}, #{summaryOfDisputes}, #{focus}, #{patientAsk}, #{nextLink}, #{nextLinkMan}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE REPORT_REGISTRATION SET report_emp = #{reportEmp}, patient_mobile = #{patientMobile}, patient_relation = #{patientRelation}, report_time = #{reportTime}, registration_emp = #{registrationEmp}, registration_time = #{registrationTime}, dispute_time = #{disputeTime}, is_major = #{isMajor}, summary_of_disputes = #{summaryOfDisputes}, focus = #{focus}, patient_ask = #{patientAsk}, next_link = #{nextLink}, next_link_man = #{nextLinkMan} WHERE report_registration_id = #{reportRegistrationId}
